1 // _jsPlumb qunit tests.
  2 
  3 QUnit.config.reorder = false;
  4 
  5 var _getContextNode = function() {
  6 	return $("#container");
  7 };
  8 
  9 var assertContextExists = function() {
 10 	ok(_getContextNode().length == 1, "context node exists");
 11 };
 12 
 13 var assertContextSize = function(elementCount) {
 14 	//equals(_getContextNode().children().length - _divs.length, elementCount, 'context has ' + elementCount + ' children');
 15 };
 16 
 17 var assertContextEmpty = function() {
 18 	equals(_getContextNode().children.length, 0, "context empty");
 19 };
 20 
 21 var assertEndpointCount = function(elId, count, _jsPlumb) {
 22 	equals(_jsPlumb.getTestHarness().endpointCount(elId), count, elId + " has " + count + (count > 1) ? "endpoints" : "endpoint");
 23 	equals(_jsPlumb.anchorManager.getEndpointsFor(elId).length, count, "anchor manager has " + count + (count > 1) ? "endpoints" : "endpoint");
 24 };
 25 
 26 var assertConnectionCount = function(endpoint, count) {
 27 	equals(endpoint.connections.length, count, "endpoint has " + count + " connections");
 28 };
 29 
 30 var assertConnectionByScopeCount = function(scope, count, _jsPlumb) {
 31 	equals(_jsPlumb.getTestHarness().connectionCount(scope), count, 'Scope ' + scope + " has " + count + (count > 1) ? "connections" : "connection");
 32 
 33 };
 34 
 35 var _divs = [];
 36 var _addDiv = function(id, parent) {
 37 	var d1 = document.createElement("div");
 38 	if (parent) parent.append(d1); else _getContextNode().append(d1);
 39 	d1 = jsPlumb.CurrentLibrary.getElementObject(d1);
 40 	jsPlumb.CurrentLibrary.setAttribute(d1, "id", id);
 41 	_divs.push(id);
 42 	return d1;
 43 };
 44 
 45 var defaults = null,
 46 	_cleanup = function(_jsPlumb) {	
 47 	
 48 	_jsPlumb.reset();
 49 	_jsPlumb.Defaults = defaults;
 50 	
 51 	for (var i in _divs) {
 52 		$("#" + _divs[i]).remove();		
 53 	}	
 54 	_divs.splice(0, _divs.length - 1);
 55 
 56 	$("#container").empty();
 57 };
 58 
 59 var testSuite = function(renderMode, _jsPlumb) {
 60 	
 61 
 62 	module("jsPlumb", {
 63 		teardown: function() { 
 64 			_cleanup(_jsPlumb); 
 65 		},
 66 		setup:function() {
 67 			defaults = jsPlumb.extend({}, _jsPlumb.Defaults);
 68 		}
 69 	});

 72 	var container = document.createElement("div");
 73 	container.id = "container";
 74 	document.body.appendChild(container);

 77

 80 	test(renderMode + " : getElementObject", function() {
 81 		var e = document.createElement("div");
 82 		e.id = "FOO";
 83 		document.body.appendChild(e);
 84 		var el = jpcl.getElementObject(e);
 85 		equals(jpcl.getAttribute(el, "id"), "FOO");
 86 	});

 89 		var e = document.createElement("div");
 90 		e.id = "FOO";
 91 		document.body.appendChild(e);
 92 		var el = jpcl.getElementObject(e);
 93 		var e2 = jpcl.getDOMElement(el);
 94 		equals(e2.id, "FOO");
 95 	});

106 	test(renderMode + ': create a simple endpoint', function() {
107 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1");
108 		var e = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint($("#d1"), {});
109 		ok(e, 'endpoint exists');  
110 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 1, _jsPlumb);
111 		ok(e.id != null, "endpoint has had an id assigned");
112 	});
113 	
114 	test(renderMode + ': create and remove a simple endpoint', function() {
115 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1");
116 		var ee = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, {uuid:"78978597593"});
117 		ok(ee != null, "endpoint exists");
118 		var e = _jsPlumb.getEndpoint("78978597593");
119 		ok(e != null, "the endpoint could be retrieved by UUID");
120 		ok(e.id != null, "the endpoint has had an id assigned to it");
121 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 1, _jsPlumb);
122 		assertContextSize(1); // one Endpoint canvas.
123 		_jsPlumb.removeEndpoint(d1, ee);	 
124 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 0, _jsPlumb);
125 		e = _jsPlumb.getEndpoint("78978597593");
126 		equals(e, null, "the endpoint has been deleted");
127 		assertContextSize(0); // no Endpoint canvases.
128 	});
129 	
130 	test(renderMode + ': create two simple endpoints, registered using a selector', function() {
131 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
132 		d1.addClass("window");d2.addClass("window");
133 		var endpoints = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint($(".window"), {});
134 		equals(endpoints.length, 2, "endpoint added to both windows");  
135 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 1, _jsPlumb);
136 		assertEndpointCount("d2", 1, _jsPlumb);
137 	});

142 		var endpoints = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(["d1", "d2"], {});
143 		equals(endpoints.length, 2, "endpoint added to both windows");  
144 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 1, _jsPlumb);
145 		assertEndpointCount("d2", 1, _jsPlumb);
146 	});

160 	test(renderMode + ': defaultEndpointMaxConnections', function() {
161 		var d3 = _addDiv("d3"), d4 = _addDiv("d4");
162 		var e3 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d3, {isSource:true});
163 		ok(e3.anchor, 'endpoint 3 has an anchor');
164 		var e4 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d4, {isSource:true});
165 		assertEndpointCount("d3", 1, _jsPlumb);
166 		assertEndpointCount("d4", 1, _jsPlumb);
167 		assertContextSize(2);						// one canvas for each of our two endpoints.
168 		ok(!e3.isFull(), "endpoint 3 is not full.");
169 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d3, target:'d4', sourceEndpoint:e3, targetEndpoint:e4});
170 		assertConnectionCount(e3, 1);   // we have one connection
171 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d3, target:'d4', sourceEndpoint:e3, targetEndpoint:e4});
172 		assertConnectionCount(e3, 1);  // should have refused the connection; default max is 1.
173 		assertContextSize(3); // now we have one more canvas, for the Connection that was accepted.
174 	});
175 	
176 	test(renderMode + ': specifiedEndpointMaxConnections', function() {
177 		var d5 = _addDiv("d5"), d6 = _addDiv("d6");
178 		var e5 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d5, {isSource:true, maxConnections:3});
179 		ok(e5.anchor, 'endpoint 5 has an anchor');
180 		var e6 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d6, {isSource:true, maxConnections:2});  // this one has max TWO
181 		assertEndpointCount("d5", 1, _jsPlumb); assertEndpointCount("d6", 1, _jsPlumb);
182 		assertContextSize(2);
183 		ok(!e5.isFull(), "endpoint 5 is not full.");
184 		_jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e5, targetEndpoint:e6});
185 		assertConnectionCount(e5, 1);   // we have one connection
186 		assertContextSize(3);
187 		_jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e5, targetEndpoint:e6});
188 		assertConnectionCount(e5, 2);  // two connections
189 		assertContextSize(4);
190 		_jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e5, targetEndpoint:e6});
191 		assertConnectionCount(e5, 2);  // should have refused; max is 2, for d4.
192 		assertContextSize(4);
193 	});
194 	
195 	test(renderMode + ': noEndpointMaxConnections', function() {
196 		var d3 = _addDiv("d3"), d4 = _addDiv("d4");
197 		var e3 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d3, {isSource:true, maxConnections:-1});
198 		var e4 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d4, {isSource:true, maxConnections:-1});
199 		_jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e3, targetEndpoint:e4});
200 		assertContextSize(3);
201 		assertConnectionCount(e3, 1);   // we have one connection
202 		_jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e3, targetEndpoint:e4});
203 		assertConnectionCount(e3, 2);  // we have two.  etc (default was one. this proves max is working).
204 		assertContextSize(4);
205 		var d5 = _addDiv("d5"), d6 = _addDiv("d6");
206 		var e5 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d3, {isSource:true, maxConnections:-1});
207 		_jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e5, targetEndpoint:e4});
208 		assertConnectionCount(e4, 3);
209 		assertContextSize(6);
210 	});

243 	test(renderMode + ': _jsPlumb.detach should fire detach event by default', function() {
244 		var d5 = _addDiv("d5"), d6 = _addDiv("d6");
245 		var conn = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d5, target:d6});
246 		var eventCount = 0;
247 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnectionDetached", function(c) { eventCount++; });
248 		_jsPlumb.detach(conn);
249 		equals(eventCount, 1);
250 	});

323 	test(renderMode + ': getConnections (simple case, default scope; detach by element id using params object)', function() {
324 		var d5 = _addDiv("d5"), d6 = _addDiv("d6"), d7 = _addDiv("d7");
325 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d5, target:d6});
326 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d6, target:d7});

375 // beforeDetach functionality
376 	
377 	test(renderMode + ": detach; beforeDetach on connect call returns false", function() {
378 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
379 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2, beforeDetach:function(conn) { return false; }});
380 		equals(c.endpoints[0].connections.length, 1, "source endpoint has a connection initially");
381 		_jsPlumb.detach(c);
382 		equals(c.endpoints[0].connections.length, 1, "source endpoint has a connection after detach call was denied");
383 	});
384 	
385 	test(renderMode + ": detach; beforeDetach on connect call returns true", function() {
386 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
387 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2, beforeDetach:function(conn) { return true; }});
388 		equals(c.endpoints[0].connections.length, 1, "source endpoint has a connection initially");
389 		_jsPlumb.detach(c);
390 		equals(c.endpoints[0].connections.length, 0, "source endpoint has no connections after detach call was allowed");
391 	});
392 
393 	test(renderMode + ": detach; beforeDetach on connect call throws an exception; we treat it with the contempt it deserves and pretend it said the detach was ok.", function() {
394 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
395 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2, beforeDetach:function(conn) { throw "i am an example of badly coded beforeDetach, but i don't break jsPlumb "; }});
396 		equals(c.endpoints[0].connections.length, 1, "source endpoint has a connection initially");
397 		_jsPlumb.detach(c);
398 		equals(c.endpoints[0].connections.length, 0, "source endpoint has no connections after detach call was allowed");
399 	});

409 	});

422 	test(renderMode + ": Endpoint.detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to source Endpoint returns false; Endpoint.detach returns false too (the UI needs it to)", function() {
423 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
424 		var e1 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, { isSource:true, beforeDetach:function(conn) { return false; } }),
425 		e2 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d2, { isTarget:true });
426 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e1,target:e2});
427 		equals(c.endpoints[0].connections.length, 1, "source endpoint has a connection initially");

430 		ok(!success, "Endpoint reported detach did not execute");

433 	test(renderMode + ": _jsPlumb.detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to target Endpoint returns false", function() {
434 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
435 		var e1 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, { isSource:true }),

443     test(renderMode + ": _jsPlumb.detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to target Endpoint returns false but detach is forced", function() {
444 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
445 		var e1 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, { isSource:true }),
446 		e2 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d2, { isTarget:true, beforeDetach:function(conn) { return false; } });
447 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e1,target:e2});
448 		equals(c.endpoints[1].connections.length, 1, "target endpoint has a connection initially");
449 		_jsPlumb.detach(c, {forceDetach:true});
450         equals(c.endpoints[0].connections.length, 0, "source endpoint has no connections after detach call was denied but forced anyway");
451 		equals(c.endpoints[1].connections.length, 0, "target endpoint has no connections after detach call was denied but forced anyway");
452 	});

528     test(renderMode + ": _jsPlumb.detachEveryConnection fires events", function() {
529         var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"), connCount = 0;
530         _jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnection", function() { connCount++; });
531         _jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnectionDetached", function() { connCount--; });
532         _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
533         _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
534         equals(connCount, 2, "two connections registered");
535         _jsPlumb.detachEveryConnection();
536         equals(connCount, 0, "no connections registered");
537     });

543         _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
544         _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
545         equals(connCount, 2, "two connections registered");
546         _jsPlumb.detachEveryConnection({fireEvent:false});
547         equals(connCount, 2, "two connections registered");

577 		var c = _jsPlumb.getConnections("testScope");  // will get all connections in testScope	
578 		equals(c.length, 1, "there is one connection");
579 		equals(c[0].sourceId, 'd5', "the connection's source is d5");
580 		equals(c[0].targetId, 'd6', "the connection's source is d6");
581 		c = _jsPlumb.getConnections();  // will get all connections in default scope; should be none.
582 		equals(c.length, 0, "there are no connections in the default scope");
583 	});

675 	test(renderMode + ': connection event listeners', function() {
676 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
677 		var returnedParams = null/*, returnedParams2 = null*/;
678 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnection", function(params) {
679 				returnedParams = $.extend({}, params);
680 		});
681 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
682 		ok(returnedParams != null, "new connection listener event was fired");
683 		ok(returnedParams.connection != null, 'connection is set');
684 		equals(returnedParams.sourceId, "d1", 'sourceid is set');
685 		equals(returnedParams.targetId, "d2", 'targetid is set');
686 		equals(returnedParams.source.attr("id"), "d1", 'source is set');
687 		equals(returnedParams.target.attr("id"), "d2" , 'target is set');
688 		ok(returnedParams.sourceEndpoint != null, "source endpoint is not null");
689 		ok(returnedParams.targetEndpoint != null, "target endpoint is not null");
690 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnectionDetached", function(params) {
691 			returnedParams = $.extend({}, params);
692 		});
693 		_jsPlumb.detach(c);
694 		ok(returnedParams.connection != null, 'connection is set');		
695 	});

822 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
823 		var count = 0;
824 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnection", function(params) {
825 			count++;
826 		});
827 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
828 		ok(count == 1, "received one event");
829 		_jsPlumb.unbind("jsPlumbConnection");
830 		var c2 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
831 		ok(count == 1, "still received only one event");
832 		
833 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnectionDetached", function(params) {
834 			count--;
835 		});
836 		_jsPlumb.detach(c);
837 		ok(count == 0, "count of events is now zero");		
838 	});

841 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
842 		var count = 0;
843 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnection", function(params) {
844 			count++;
845 		});
846 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
847 		ok(count == 1, "received one event");		
848 		var c2 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
849 		ok(count == 2, "received two events");
850 		
851 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnectionDetached", function(params) {
852 			count--;
853 		});
854 		_jsPlumb.detach(c);
855 		ok(count == 1, "count of events is now one");		
856 		_jsPlumb.unbind("jsPlumbConnectionDetached");
857 		_jsPlumb.detach(c2);
858 		ok(count == 1, "count of events is still one");		
859 	});

866 		});
867 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2}),
868 			c2 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2}),
869 			c3 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
870 
871 		ok(count == 3, "received three events");					
872 		
873 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnectionDetached", function(params) {
874 			count--;
875 		});
876 		_jsPlumb.detach(c);
877 		ok(count == 2, "count of events is now two");	
878 			
879 		_jsPlumb.unbind();  // unbind everything
880 
881 		_jsPlumb.detach(c2);
882 		_jsPlumb.detach(c3);
883 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2})
884 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2})
885 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2})
886 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2})
887 
888 		ok(count == 2, "count of events is still two");		
889 	});

891 	test(renderMode + ": Endpoint.detachFrom", function() {
892 		var d16 = _addDiv("d16"), d17 = _addDiv("d17");
893 		var e16 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d16, {isSource:true});
894 		ok(e16.anchor, 'endpoint 16 has an anchor');
895 		var e17 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d17, {isSource:true});
896 		var conn = _jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e16, targetEndpoint:e17});
897 		assertConnectionCount(e16, 1);
898 		assertConnectionCount(e17, 1);
899 		assertContextSize(3);
900 		assertConnectionByScopeCount(_jsPlumb.getDefaultScope(), 1, _jsPlumb);
901 		e16.detachFrom(e17);	
902 		assertContextSize(2);				// the endpoint canvases should remain
903 		// but the connection should be gone, meaning not registered by _jsPlumb and not registered on either Endpoint:
904 		assertConnectionCount(e16, 0);
905 		assertConnectionCount(e17, 0);
906 		assertConnectionByScopeCount(_jsPlumb.getDefaultScope(), 0, _jsPlumb);  
907 	});

909 	test(renderMode + ": Endpoint.detachFromConnection", function() {
910 		var d16 = _addDiv("d16"), d17 = _addDiv("d17");
911 		var e16 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d16, {isSource:true});
912 		ok(e16.anchor, 'endpoint 16 has an anchor');
913 		var e17 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d17, {isSource:true});
914 		var conn = _jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e16, targetEndpoint:e17});
915 		assertConnectionCount(e16, 1);
916 		assertConnectionCount(e17, 1);
917 		assertContextSize(3);
918 		assertConnectionByScopeCount(_jsPlumb.getDefaultScope(), 1, _jsPlumb);
919 		e16.detachFromConnection(conn);	
920 		assertContextSize(3);				// all canvases should remain; the connection was not removed.
921 		// but endpoint e16 should have no connections now.
922 		assertConnectionCount(e16, 0);
923 		assertConnectionCount(e17, 1);
924 		assertConnectionByScopeCount(_jsPlumb.getDefaultScope(), 1, _jsPlumb);  
925 	});

1025 	test(renderMode + ": _jsPlumb.deleteEndpoint (by uuid, connections too)", function() {
1026 		// create two endpoints (one with a uuid), add them to two divs and then connect them.
1027 		var uuid = "14785937583175927504313";
1028 		var d16 = _addDiv("d16"), d17 = _addDiv("d17");
1029 		var e16 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d16, {isSource:true,maxConnections:-1, uuid:uuid});
1030 		var e17 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d17, {isSource:true,maxConnections:-1});
1031 		_jsPlumb.connect({sourceEndpoint:e16, targetEndpoint:e17});
1032 		// check that the connection was ok.
1033 		equals(e16.connections.length, 1, "e16 has one connection");
1034 		equals(e17.connections.length, 1, "e17 has one connection");
1035 		assertContextSize(3);
1036 		
1037 		// delete the endpoint that has a uuid.  verify that the endpoint cannot be retrieved and that the connection has been removed, but that
1038 		// element d17 still has its Endpoint.
1039 		_jsPlumb.deleteEndpoint(uuid);
1040 		var f = _jsPlumb.getEndpoint(uuid);
1041 		equals(f, null, "endpoint has been deleted");
1042 		equals(e16.connections.length, 0, "e16 has no connections");
1043 		equals(e17.connections.length, 0, "e17 has no connections");
1044 		var ebe = _jsPlumb.getTestHarness().endpointsByElement["d16"];
1045 		equals(ebe.length, 0, "no endpoints registered for element d16 anymore");
1046 		ebe = _jsPlumb.getTestHarness().endpointsByElement["d17"];
1047 		equals(ebe.length, 1, "element d17 still has its Endpoint");
1048 		assertContextSize(1);
1049 		
1050 		// now delete d17's endpoint and check that it has gone.
1051 		_jsPlumb.deleteEndpoint(e17);
1052 		f = _jsPlumb.getEndpoint(e17);
1053 		equals(f, null, "endpoint has been deleted");
1054 		ebe = _jsPlumb.getTestHarness().endpointsByElement["d17"];
1055 		equals(ebe.length, 0, "element d17 no longer has any Endpoints");
1056 		assertContextSize(0);
1057 	});

1541 	// makeSource, then unmake it. should not be able to make a connection from it. then connect to it, which should succeed,
1542 	// because jsPlumb will just add a new endpoint.
1543 	test(renderMode + ": jsPlumb.unmakeSource (string id as argument)", function() {
1544 		var d16 = _addDiv("d16"), d17 = _addDiv("d17"); 
1545 		var e16 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d16, {isSource:false, isTarget:true}, {anchors:[[0,0.5,0,-1], [1,0.5,0,1]]});
1546 		_jsPlumb.makeSource(d17, { isSource:true,anchor:"LeftMiddle"  }); // give it a non-default anchor, we will check this below.
1547 		ok(_jsPlumb.isSource(d17) == true, "d17 is currently a source");
1548 		// unmake source
1549 		_jsPlumb.unmakeSource(d17);		
1550 		ok(_jsPlumb.isSource(d17) == false, "d17 is no longer a source");
1551 
1552 		// this should succeed, because d17 is no longer a source and so jsPlumb will just create and add a new endpoint to d17.
1553 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:"d17", target:e16});
1554 		assertEndpointCount("d16", 1, _jsPlumb);
1555 		assertEndpointCount("d17", 1, _jsPlumb);				
1556 	});

1564 		// unmake target

1575 	test(renderMode + ": jsPlumb.removeEverySource and removeEveryTarget (string id as argument)", function() {
1576 		var d16 = _addDiv("d16"), d17 = _addDiv("d17"), d18 = _addDiv("d18");
1577 		_jsPlumb.makeSource(d16).makeTarget(d17).makeSource(d18);
1578 		ok(_jsPlumb.isSource(d16) == true, "d16 is a source");
1579 		ok(_jsPlumb.isTarget(d17) == true, "d17 is a target");
1580 		ok(_jsPlumb.isSource(d18) == true, "d18 is a source");
1581 
1582 		_jsPlumb.unmakeEverySource();
1583 		_jsPlumb.unmakeEveryTarget();
1584 
1585 		ok(_jsPlumb.isSource(d16) == false, "d16 is no longer a source");
1586 		ok(_jsPlumb.isTarget(d17) == false, "d17 is no longer a target");
1587 		ok(_jsPlumb.isSource(d18) == false, "d18 is no longer a source");
1588 	});

1590 // *********************** end of makeTarget (and associated methods) tests ************************ 
1591 	
1592 	test(renderMode + ': _jsPlumb.connect (between two Endpoints)', function() {
1593 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
1594 		var e = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, {});
1595 		var e2 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d2, {});
1596 		ok(e, 'endpoint e exists');
1597 		ok(e2, 'endpoint e2 exists');
1598 		assertContextSize(2);				// should have a canvas for each endpoint now.  
1599 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 1, _jsPlumb);
1600 		assertEndpointCount("d2", 1, _jsPlumb);
1601 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({target:'d2', sourceEndpoint:e, targetEndpoint:e2});
1602 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 1, _jsPlumb);		// no new endpoint should have been added
1603 		assertEndpointCount("d2", 1, _jsPlumb); 		// no new endpoint should have been added
1604 		assertContextSize(3);				// now we should also have a canvas for the connection.
1605 		ok(c.id != null, "connection has had an id assigned");

1880 		equals(0.7, conn.endpoints[1].anchor.x, "target anchor x");
1881 		equals(0.7, conn.endpoints[1].anchor.y, "target anchor y");
1882 		equals(0.3, conn2.endpoints[0].anchor.x, "source anchor x");

2022 	test(renderMode + ": _jsPlumb.connect (connect by element, default endpoint, supplied dynamic anchors)", function() {
2023 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"), d3 = _addDiv("d3");
2024 		var anchors = [ [0.25, 0, 0, -1], [1, 0.25, 1, 0], [0.75, 1, 0, 1], [0, 0.75, -1, 0] ];
2025 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2, dynamicAnchors:anchors});                // auto connect with default endpoint and provided anchors
2026 		assertContextSize(3);
2027 		assertConnectionByScopeCount(_jsPlumb.getDefaultScope(), 1, _jsPlumb);
2028 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 1, _jsPlumb);assertEndpointCount("d2", 1, _jsPlumb);
2029 		_jsPlumb.detach({source:d1, target:d2});
2030 		// this changed in 1.3.5, because auto generated endpoints are now removed by detach.  so i added the test below this one
2031 		// to check that the deleteEndpointsOnDetach flag is honoured.
2032 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 0, _jsPlumb);assertEndpointCount("d2", 0, _jsPlumb);
2033 		assertContextSize(2);
2034 	});

2120 	test(renderMode + ": _jsPlumb.connect (testing for connection event callback)", function() {
2121 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"), d3 = _addDiv("d3");
2122 		var connectCallback = null, detachCallback = null;
2123 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnection", function(params) {
2124 				connectCallback = $.extend({}, params);
2125 			});
2126 		_jsPlumb.bind("jsPlumbConnectionDetached", function(params) {
2127 				detachCallback = $.extend({}, params);
2128 			});
2129 		_jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});                // auto connect with default endpoint and anchor set
2130 		ok(connectCallback != null, "connect callback was made");
2131 		assertContextSize(3);
2132 		assertConnectionByScopeCount(_jsPlumb.getDefaultScope(), 1, _jsPlumb);
2133 		assertEndpointCount("d1", 1, _jsPlumb);assertEndpointCount("d2", 1, _jsPlumb);
2134 		_jsPlumb.detach({source:d1, target:d2});
2135 		assertContextSize(2);
2136 		ok(detachCallback != null, "detach callback was made");
2137 	});

2140 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
2141 		var c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1,target:d2,cssClass:"CSS"});
2142 		var has = function(clazz) { 
2143 			var cn = c.connector.canvas.className,
2144 				cns = cn.constructor == String ? cn : cn.baseVal; 
2145 			
2146 			return cns.indexOf(clazz) != -1; 
2147 		};		
2148 		ok(has("CSS"), "custom cssClass set correctly");
2149 		ok(has(_jsPlumb.connectorClass), "basic connector class set correctly");
2150 	});

2652 	test(renderMode + ": Endpoint.isVisible/setVisible (one connection, other Endpoint's visibility should track changes in the source, because it has only this connection.)", function() {
2653 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2");
2654 		var e1 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1), e2 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d2);
2655 		equals(true, e1.isVisible(), "Endpoint is visible after creation.");
2656 		var c1 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e1, target:e2});
2657 		e1.setVisible(false);
2658 		equals(false, e1.isVisible(), "Endpoint is not visible after calling setVisible(false).");
2659 		equals(false, e2.isVisible(), "other Endpoint is not visible either.");
2660 		equals(false, c1.isVisible(), "connection between the two is not visible either.");
2661 		
2662 		e1.setVisible(true);
2663 		equals(true, e1.isVisible(), "Endpoint is visible after calling setVisible(true).");
2664 		equals(true, e2.isVisible(), "other Endpoint is visible too");
2665 		equals(true, c1.isVisible(), "connection between the two is visible too.");
2666 	});

2668 	test(renderMode + ": Endpoint.isVisible/setVisible (one connection, other Endpoint's visibility should not track changes in the source, because it has another connection.)", function() {
2669 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"), d3 = _addDiv("d3");
2670 		var e1 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1), e2 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d2, { maxConnections:2 }), e3 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d3);
2671 		equals(true, e1.isVisible(), "Endpoint is visible after creation.");
2672 		var c1 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e1, target:e2});
2673 		var c2 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e2, target:e3});
2674 		
2675 		e1.setVisible(false);
2676 		equals(false, e1.isVisible(), "Endpoint is not visible after calling setVisible(false).");
2677 		equals(true, e2.isVisible(), "other Endpoint should still be visible.");
2678 		equals(true, e3.isVisible(), "third Endpoint should still be visible.");
2679 		equals(false, c1.isVisible(), "connection between the two is not visible either.");
2680 		equals(true, c2.isVisible(), "other connection is visible.");
2681 		
2682 		e1.setVisible(true);
2683 		equals(true, e1.isVisible(), "Endpoint is visible after calling setVisible(true).");
2684 		equals(true, e2.isVisible(), "other Endpoint is visible too");
2685 		equals(true, c1.isVisible(), "connection between the two is visible too.");
2686 		equals(true, c2.isVisible(), "other connection is visible.");
2687 	});

2840 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"),
2841 		e = { isSource:true, isTarget:true, maxConnections:-1 },
2842 		e1 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, e),
2843 		e2 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d2, e),
2844 		c1 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e1, target:e2});

2847 		equals(true, e1.isVisible(), "endpoint 1 is visible after creation.");

2857 		
2858 		equals(true, c1.isVisible(), "Connection 1 is visible again.");
2859 		equals(false, e1.isVisible(), "endpoint 1 is no longer visible.");
2860 		equals(true, e2.isVisible(), "endpoint 2 is still visible.");

2864 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"),
2865 		e = { isSource:true, isTarget:true, maxConnections:-1 },
2866 		e1 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, e),
2867 		e2 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d2, e),
2868 		c1 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e1, target:e2});

2873 		equals(false, e1.isVisible(), "endpoint 1 is no longer visible.");
2874 		equals(true, e2.isVisible(), "endpoint 2 is still visible.");
2875 		
2876 		_jsPlumb.show(d1, true);  // now show d1, and alter the endpoints. e1 should be visible.
2877 		
2878 		equals(true, c1.isVisible(), "Connection 1 is visible again.");
2879 		equals(true, e1.isVisible(), "endpoint 1 is visible again.");
2880 		equals(true, e2.isVisible(), "endpoint 2 is still visible.");

2883 	test(renderMode + " _jsPlumb.show, two-arg version, endpoints should become visible, but not all connections, because some other endpoints are  not visible.", function() {
2884 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"), d3 = _addDiv("d3"),
2885 		e = { isSource:true, isTarget:true, maxConnections:-1 },
2886 		e1 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, e),
2887 		e11 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1, e),
2888 		e2 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d2, e),
2889 		e3 = _jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d3, e),
2890 		c1 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e1, target:e2}),
2891 		c2 = _jsPlumb.connect({source:e11, target:e3});
2892 			
2893 		// we now have d1 connected to both d3 and d2.  we'll hide d1, and everything on d1 should be hidden.
2894 		
2895 		_jsPlumb.hide("d1", true);
2896 		
2897 		equals(false, c1.isVisible(), "connection 1 is no longer visible.");
2898 		equals(false, c2.isVisible(), "connection 2 is no longer visible.");
2899 		equals(false, e1.isVisible(), "endpoint 1 is no longer visible.");
2900 		equals(false, e11.isVisible(), "endpoint 1 is no longer visible.");
2901 		equals(true, e2.isVisible(), "endpoint 2 is still visible.");
2902 		equals(true, e3.isVisible(), "endpoint 3 is still visible.");
2903 		
2904 		// now, we will also hide d3. making d1 visible again should NOT result in c2 becoming visible, because the other endpoint
2905 		// for c2 is e3, which is not visible.
2906 		_jsPlumb.hide(d3, true);
2907 		equals(false, e3.isVisible(), "endpoint 3 is no longer visible.");
2908 		
2909 		_jsPlumb.show(d1, true);  // now show d1, and alter the endpoints. e1 should be visible, c1 should be visible, but c2 should not.
2910 		
2911 		equals(true, c1.isVisible(), "Connection 1 is visible again.");
2912 		equals(false, c2.isVisible(), "Connection 2 is not visible.");
2913 		equals(true, e1.isVisible(), "endpoint 1 is visible again.");
2914 		equals(true, e11.isVisible(), "endpoint 11 is visible again.");
2915 		equals(true, e2.isVisible(), "endpoint 2 is still visible.");
2916 		equals(false, e3.isVisible(), "endpoint 3 is still not visible.");
2917 	});

2980 		// now try functions

2982 		o.setLabel(aFunction);

3096     var tolerance = 0.00000005, withinTolerance = function(v1, v2, msg) {
3097         if (Math.abs(v1 - v2) < tolerance) ok(true, msg + "; expected " + v1 + " and got it");
3098         else {
3099             ok(false, msg + "; expected " + v1 + " got " + v2);
3100         }
3101     };

3104 		equals(m, -1, "gradient calculated correctly for simple case");
3105 	});

3279     test(renderMode + " id clashes between instances", function() {
3280     	var d1 = document.createElement("div"),
3281     		d2 = document.createElement("div"),
3282     		_jsp2 = jsPlumb.getInstance();
3283     	
3284     	document.body.appendChild(d1);
3285     	document.body.appendChild(d2);
3286 
3287     	_jsPlumb.addEndpoint(d1);
3288     	_jsp2.addEndpoint(d2);
3289 
3290     	var id1 = d1.getAttribute("id"),
3291     		id2 = d2.getAttribute("id");
3292 
3293     	var idx = id1.indexOf("_"), idx2 = id1.lastIndexOf("_"), v1 = id1.substring(idx, idx2);
3294     	var idx3 = id2.indexOf("_"), idx4 = id2.lastIndexOf("_"), v2 = id2.substring(idx3, idx4);
3295 
3296     	ok (v1 != v2, "instance versions are different : " + v1 + " : " + v2);
3297     });

3345     		Anchors:["TopLeft", "TopRight"]
3346     	});
3347 
3348     	var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"), conn = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2}),

3355

3816 				]
3817 			});

3826 			ok(!(s.get(j).isHover()), "hover is set to false");
3827 			equals(s.get(j).getLabel(), "baz", "label is set to 'baz'");
3828 		}

3885 	test(renderMode + " setPaintStyle", function() {
3886 		var d1 = _addDiv("d1"), d2 = _addDiv("d2"), c = _jsPlumb.connect({source:d1, target:d2});
3887 		c.setPaintStyle({strokeStyle:"FOO", lineWidth:999});
3888 		equals(c.paintStyleInUse.strokeStyle, "FOO", "strokeStyle was set");
3889 		equals(c.paintStyleInUse.lineWidth, 999, "lineWidth was set");
3890 
3891 		c.setHoverPaintStyle({strokeStyle:"BAZ",  lineWidth:444});
3892 		c.setHover(true);
3893 		equals(c.paintStyleInUse.strokeStyle, "BAZ", "strokeStyle was set");
3894 		equals(c.paintStyleInUse.lineWidth, 444, "lineWidth was set");
3895 
3896 		equals(c.getPaintStyle().strokeStyle, "FOO", "getPaintStyle returns correct value");
3897 		equals(c.getHoverPaintStyle().strokeStyle, "BAZ", "getHoverPaintStyle returns correct value");
3898 	});
